title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) hosted a Reception in honour of H.E. Kurt Campbell

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) hosted a Reception in honour of H.E. Kurt Campbell, United States Deputy Secretary of State and his delegation at the Foyer, YOUWIN Connecton Monday, 29th April, 2024.
The Honourable Minister and the visiting US Deputy Secretary of State co-Chaired the 6th Session of the Nigeria-US Bi-National Commission (29th – 30th April, 2024).
